Interface Bindings

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bindings.Inner
public interface Bindings
This class contains key-value pairs.

3.0.0
Author:
mathter

  • Method Details

    • up

      Optional<Bindings> up()
      This method returns parent bindings. Can return empty.
      Returns:

    • get

      <T> T get(String key)
      Method returns object for specific key. If value not found method try search in parent bindings.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of returned value.
      Parameters:
      key - key.
      Returns:
      value.
      See Also:
      • up()

    • put

      <T> void put(String key, T value)
      Method puts value corresponding to the specific key.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the value.
      Parameters:
      key - key.
      value - value.

    • bindings

      static Bindings bindings()
      Method create new empty bindings.
      Returns:
      empty bindings.

    • bindings

      static Bindings bindings(Bindings up)
      Method creates new empty bindings with parent one.
      Parameters:
      up - parent bindings.
      Returns:
      empty bindings with parent one.

    • bindings

      static Bindings bindings(String key, Object value)
      Method creates new bindings with one key-value pair.
      Parameters:
      key - key.
      value - value.
      Returns:
      new bingings.

    • bindings

      static Bindings bindings(String key0, Object value0, String key1, Object value1)
      Method creates new bindings with two key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      key0 - first key.
      value0 - first value.
      key1 - second key.
      value1 - second value.
      Returns:
      new bindings.

    • bindings

      static Bindings bindings(String key0, Object value0, String key1, Object value1, String key2, Object value2)
      Method creates new bindings with three key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      key0 - first key.
      value0 - first value.
      key1 - second key.
      value1 - second value.
      key2 - third key.
      value2 - third value.
      Returns:
      new bindings.
